// Pivot 0, 0
int pinball[16] = {
	576, 691,
	576, 661,
	625, 622,
	629, 639,
	665, 638,
	630, 367,
	633, 340,
	677, 692
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float pinball[16] = {
	0.450000f, 0.959722f,
	0.450000f, 0.918056f,
	0.488281f, 0.863889f,
	0.491406f, 0.887500f,
